CYCLE.DESCRIPTION: When drawn, discard this and draw a new card. Only works once per turn.

BLUR.DESCRIPTION: Your #yBlock is carried over between turns.

METALLICIZE.DESCRIPTION: Gain #yBlock at the end of each turn.

PLATED_ARMOR.DESCRIPTION: Gain #yBlock at the end of each turn. Reduced when you take unblocked damage.

SLIMED.DESCRIPTION: Slimed is a status card that costs [R] to exhaust.

CORES.DESCRIPTION: Cores are cards that #yCycle and apply a small bonus effect.

EGG.DESCRIPTION: Eggs are relics that automatically #yUpgrade cards when you acquire them.

MEGA_UPGRADE.DESCRIPTION: A second upgrade that makes Construct cards even more powerful.

OVERHEAT.DESCRIPTION: When too many cards #yCycle in one turn, transform this card into a #yBurn for this combat.
